signin.to_connect: Sign in to your Company account to link it to __wallet__
signin.crm_desc: Stay in the know with -for-you e-mails from Company.
signin.crm_agreement: I agree Company may uons with Company to tailor my emails.

send_otp_page.description: For security purposes, we need to send you a verification code to the email address associated with your Company account to confirm your identity.

verify_otp_page.description: You should receive your code via email shortly. Didn't receive our email?

max_attempt_reached_page.description: You've reached the maximum number of attempts with your current verification code. To continue, we'll send you another code to verify your identity.

temporary_locked_page.description: Sorry, we weren't able to confirm your verification code. For security purposes, we've temporarily locked your device. Please try again later.

errors.invalid_otp: Sorry, the code you entered is incorrect.
errors.account_not_found: Sorry, we weren't able to find this email address in our system. Please try again.
errors.account_disabled: Sorry, we’re unable to process your request at this time. For your protection, your account has been temporarily disabled. Please contact Customer Support.
errors.account_unavailable: Sorry, we’re unable to process  your request at this time. Try again later or contact Customer Support.
errors.account_locked: Sorry, for your protection, your account has been locked. You may attempt to log back in by clicking “Forgot?” or try again later.

send_otp_page.description: We'll send you a password reset code to the email address associated with your Company account to reset your password.

verify_otp_page.description: You should receive your code via email shortly. Didn't receive our email?

max_attempt_reached_page.description: You've reached the max amount of attempts with this code. To continue, you'll need to get another password reset code.

temporary_locked_page.description: Sorry, we weren't able to confirm your password reset code. For security purposes, we've temporarily locked your device. Please try again later.

create_new_password_page.title: Create a new password
create_new_password_page.description: Once you've successfully created your password, you'll link your Company Checkout account to __wallet__

notifications.create_password_success`: Your password has been successfully updated!

errors.invalid_otp: Sorry, the reset code you entered is incorrect.
errors.account_not_found: Sorry, we weren't able to find this email address in our system. Please try again.
errors.account_disabled: Sorry, we’re unable to process your request at this time. For your protection, your account has been temporarily disabled. Please contact Customer Support.
errors.account_unavailable: Sorry, we’re unable to process  your request at this time. Try again later or contact Customer Support.
errors.account_locked: Sorry, for your protection, your account has been locked. You may attempt to log back in by clicking “Forgot?” or try again later.
errors.cant_use_same_password: Sorry, your new password can't be the same as your previous one.

link_account.acknowledgement: You acknowledge that by connecting __wallet__ to Company, you allow __wallet__ to share your cards with Company to enable online purchases.
